title: Our FIRST Ryzen 3900X / RX 5700 XT Gaming PC Build!
tags: how to build a gaming pc
description:
The AMD Ryzen 9 3900X and RX 5700 XT have performance that's really hard to beat from a value perspective.  After a ton of time testing and running benchmarks, it was time to have fun with an X570 gaming PC build.  Honestly, there were some issues which needed troubleshooting but in the end, we were super happy with the result.  Add a bit of 3900X overclocking into it and....this is one of our favorite builds yet in 2019!

Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:

Ryzen 9 3900X:  https://geni.us/3900X
ASRock X570 Taichi: https://geni.us/X570TAICHI
ASRock X570 Phantom:  https://geni.us/X570PHANTOM
Radeon 5700 XT (Gigabyte):  https://geni.us/GB5700XT 
Radeon 5700 XT (XFX):  https://geni.us/XFX5700XT
Corsair Vengeance 32GB:  https://geni.us/V32GB
Corsair Vengeance 16GB:  https://geni.us/V16GB
Aorus PCIe Gen4 SSD:  https://geni.us/AORUSGEN4
Enermax LiqTech II AIO:  https://geni.us/LIQII360

BeQuiet Dark Rock Slim:  https://geni.us/DRSLIM
Corsair Hydro Series:  http://bit.ly/HYDROXS

Subscribe ► https://bit.ly/SubHWC

Review unit provided free of charge by the companies mentioned. This video is sponsored by be quiet! and Corsair. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no review direction was received from manufacturer. 

As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases. 

Gear list (Available on Amazon): 
Main Camera - https://geni.us/SONYA7III
Main Lens - https://geni.us/Tamron2875
Main Camera Mic - https://geni.us/RODEMIC
Second Camera - https://geni.us/GH5w1260
$700 Camera (Panasonic G7) - https://geni.us/24nm
Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 - https://geni.us/dLL
Cinevate DUZI Slider - https://geni.us/1Hwt
AKG C314 - https://geni.us/6o9
AKG C 568 B - https://geni.us/1D2S
Zoom H5 - https://geni.us/2LUm
